definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
variant of 閹|阉[yan1]/to castrate/variant of 淹[yan1]/to delay

sentences.english: They had pears in white wine, with a piece of fruitcake.
sentences.chinese: 他們喫着白葡萄酒醃泡過的梨子，配着水果蛋糕。

sentences.english: Reduce edible salt bloats, smoke, barbecue food.
sentences.chinese: 減少食用鹽醃，煙燻，燒烤的食物。

sentences.english: Every summer, mother puts up a large quantity of vegetables for us to eat during the winter.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天母親都要醃大量鹹菜到冬天食用。

sentences.english: Place cucumber, green pepper and onion into a large salad bowl, salt them.
sentences.chinese: 將黃瓜，青椒和洋蔥放在大的色拉碗中，加鹽醃。

sentences.english: Less expensive meats can be marinated and slow cooked, so they’re tender.
sentences.chinese: 比較便宜的肉可以醃或用慢火煮，它們是柔軟的。

sentences.english: On the fourth day, they opened one of the cans of turnips and ate it.
sentences.chinese: 第四天，他們開了一罐醃蘿蔔來喫。

sentences.english: The processing course of modernization and standardization was put forward for high quality of dry-cured ham.
sentences.chinese: 提出了生產高品質幹醃火腿的現代化加工方法。

sentences.english: Pickled ginger is at once sweet, tart, and salty. It is served with Japanese sushi.
sentences.chinese: 甜酸帶鹹的醃姜，是日本壽司的好搭配。

sentences.english: A peck of pickled peppers Peter Pipper picked.
sentences.chinese: 笛手彼得拿起了一配克醃胡椒嗎？

sentences.english: Marinate seafood in the fridge only.
sentences.chinese: 醃海鮮只能放在冰箱裏。

sentences.english: Skin and then dice the chicken fillet into cubes . Season and marinate for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把雞肉去皮後切粒，拌入調味料醃15分鐘。

sentences.english: Cut the spring onion into a few pieces. Cut the marinated salmon into slices.
sentences.chinese: 青蔥切段，醃好的三文魚切成小片狀。

sentences.english: Feta cheese, marinated grilled mixed bell peppers, sliced olives and lettuce sesoned with oregano.
sentences.chinese: 發達芝士，醃烤青椒，切片橄欖，生菜，香料。

sentences.english: Wedges Lemon, Marinated Olives, Tuna Tin, Onion Pickles, Sunflower Seeds.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬角，醃橄欖，吞拿魚，雞尾洋蔥，葵花籽。

sentences.english: The erysipelas organism is quite resistant to salting, pickling, and smoking.
sentences.chinese: 豬丹毒桿菌對鹽醃，酸浸，煙燻很有抵抗力。

sentences.english: Marinate the chicken for 1 hour, turning occassionally.
sentences.chinese: 雞用醃料醃1小時，間中反轉。

definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
